pkgmetadata.longdescription: Penalized Estimation of Flexible Hidden Markov Models for Time Series of Counts // Provides tools for penalized estimation of flexible hidden Markov models for time series of counts w/o the need to specify a (parametric) family of distributions. These include functions for model fitting, model checking, and state decoding. For details, see Adam, T., Langrock, R., and Wei, C.H. (2019): Penalized Estimation of Flexible Hidden Markov Models for Time Series of Counts. arXiv:1901.03275.
